trans-unit.resname: MOC·246 | Ambition's Cost | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: MOC·266 | Phyrexian Scriptures | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. That creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.
II — Destroy all nonartifact creatures.
III — Exile all opponents' graveyards.
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到III后牺牲之。） I — 在至多一个目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。该生物成为神器，且仍具有原本类别。 II — 消灭所有非神器的生物。 III — 放逐所有对手的坟墓场。

(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your hand. You have no maximum hand size for as long as you control CARDNAME.
II — Return all non-Phyrexian creatures to their owners' hands.
III — You may cast any number of spells from your hand without paying their mana costs. Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).

trans-unit.target: 在非瑞克西亚势力降临鞑契之前，席穆嘉一脉龙群就已生出对财宝挑剔的眼神。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·73 | Preening Champion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: On Kylem, the omens of impending invasion went largely unnoticed, drowned out by the everyday fanfare of Valor's Reach.

trans-unit.resname: MOM·74 | Protocol Knight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Protocol Knight
trans-unit.target: 守式骑士

trans-unit.resname: MOM·74 | Protocol Knight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. Put a stun counter on that creature if you control another Knight. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的生物。如果你操控另一个骑士，则在该目标生物上放置一个晕眩指示物。（如果某个其上有晕眩指示物的永久物将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·74 | Protocol Knight | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ingress without proper writ of extraplanar intent? Unacceptable!"
trans-unit.target: 「没有取得正式外时空意向手令就擅自闯入？无法接受！」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·75 | Rona, Herald of Invasion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rona, Herald of Invasion
trans-unit.target: 进军传令罗娜

trans-unit.resname: MOM·75 | Rona, Herald of Invasion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a legendary spell, untap CARDNAME.\n{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.\n{5}{PB}: Transform Rona. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放传奇咒语时，重置CARDNAME。 {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。 {5}{B/P}：转化罗娜。只能于法术时机起动。（{B/P}可用{B}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·75 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rona, Tolarian Obliterator
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚抹煞兽罗娜

trans-unit.resname: MOM·75 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever a source deals damage to CARDNAME, that source's controller exiles a card from their hand at random. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield under your control. Otherwise, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当一个来源对CARDNAME造成伤害时，该来源的操控者随机从其手上放逐一张牌。若它是地牌，则你可以将之在你的操控下放进战场。若否，则你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·75 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "At last, I am *compleat*."
trans-unit.target: 「终于，我也完化了。」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·76 | Saiba Cryptomancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Saiba Cryptomancer
trans-unit.target: 赛博派守密术士

trans-unit.resname: MOM·76 | Saiba Cryptomancer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nBackup 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.)\nHexproof
trans-unit.target: 闪现 后援1（当此生物进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若后者是另一个生物，则它获得下文之异能直到回合结束。） 辟邪

trans-unit.resname: MOM·76 | Saiba Cryptomancer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Good luck getting through a class-seven proxy ward, creep."
trans-unit.target: 「这七级代理防护祝你破解顺利，杂碎。」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·77 | See Double | Card Name
trans-unit.source: See Double
trans-unit.target: 视影成双

trans-unit.resname: MOM·77 | See Double | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
This spell can't be copied.
Choose one. If an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, you may choose both.
• Copy target spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
• Create a token that's a copy of target creature.
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被复制。 选择一项。如果任一对手的坟墓场中有八张或更多牌，则你可以两项都选。 •复制目标咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。（永久物咒语的复制品会成为衍生物。） •派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标生物之复制品。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·78 | Skyclave Aerialist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{4}{PG}: Transform CARDNAME. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PG} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {4}{G/P}：转化CARDNAME。只能于法术时机起动。（{G/P}可用{G}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·78 | Skyclave Aerialist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Together with her beloved falcon, she had explored every waterway on Zendikar, from the Tazeem highlands to the inland sea.
trans-unit.target: 她与心爱的猎隼一道，早已探遍赞迪卡的每处水道，到访上及塔晋高地，下至内陆汪洋的各个角落。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·78 | Skyclave Invader | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skyclave Invader
trans-unit.target: 空境入侵客

trans-unit.resname: MOM·78 | Skyclave Invader | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen this creature transforms into CARDNAME, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield. If you don't put the card onto the battlefield, put it into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当此生物转化为CARDNAME时，检视你的牌库顶牌。若它是地牌，则你可以将之放进战场。若你未将该牌放进战场，则将它置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·78 | Skyclave Invader | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With her guidance, the oil coursed freely across the world.
trans-unit.target: 在她的指引下，烁油方能奔流不息地流经整个世界。

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物之基础力量与防御力为0/2，具有守军异能，且失去所有其他异能。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·79 | Stasis Field | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 法师环塔的陈年故障，成了维林防线上的重要工具。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·119 | Nezumi Freewheeler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nezumi Freewheeler
trans-unit.target: 鼠人无拘车手

trans-unit.resname: MOM·119 | Nezumi Freewheeler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player mills three cards. (To mill three cards, a player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)\n{5}{PW}: Transform CARDNAME. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PW} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: 威慑 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位牌手各磨三张牌。（磨三张牌的流程是牌手将其牌库顶的三张牌置入其坟墓场。） {5}{W/P}：转化CARDNAME。只能于法术时机起动。（{W/P}可用{W}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·119 | Hideous Fleshwheeler | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 骇人筋肉车手

trans-unit.resname: MOM·119 | Hideous Fleshwheeler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)\nWhen this creature transforms into CARDNAME, put target permanent card with mana value 2 or less from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。） 当此生物转化为CARDNAME时，将目标法术力值等于或小于2的永久物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·119 | Hideous Fleshwheeler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Freedom became a distasteful memory, a thing to fear and destroy.
trans-unit.target: 往昔的自由无拘，如今成了反胃记忆，必须避而灭之。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·120 | Nezumi Informant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nezumi Informant
trans-unit.target: 线报鼠人

trans-unit.resname: MOM·120 | Nezumi Informant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位对手各弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·120 | Nezumi Informant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Tell Boss Umezawa there's a new gang moving in on our territory. I'm forwarding their insignia. Watch for it elsewhere."
trans-unit.target: 「告诉梅泽老大，有个新帮派在我们地盘上活动。现把他们的标志发给你。留意这符号有没有在其他地方出现。」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·121 | Phyrexian Gargantua | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚巨罡兽

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你抓两张牌且失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·121 | Phyrexian Gargantua | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Of course I'd rather it hadn't skinned six of my best wizards, but as nightmare fuel goes, it's a truly inspired design."\n—Braids
trans-unit.target: 「我当然希望它没有活剥我手下最强的那六位法师，不过就驱动梦魇的成效来说，这当真振奋人心。」 ～布蕾德

Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)\nDestroy target creature or planeswalker. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

trans-unit.resname: MOM·123 | Render Inert | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As New Phyrexia phased out of existence, glistening oil all across the Multiverse was cut off from its source. The *compleated* invaders ceased to function and crumpled to the ground.
trans-unit.target: 随着新非瑞克西亚跃离实界，整个多重宇宙的烁油来源就此切断。*完化*侵攻者纷纷停止动弹，摊落在地。

trans-unit.target: 后援1（当此生物进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若后者是另一个生物，则它获得下文之异能直到回合结束。） {1}，牺牲此生物：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Before I fall, I will taste the blood of Sarulf himself!"
trans-unit.target: 「在我倒下前，我要亲自尝尝萨茹夫鲜血的滋味！」

Activate only as a sorcery and only if an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.

trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — For each opponent, destroy up to one target creature or planeswalker that player controls.
II — Each opponent discards three cards, then mills three cards.
III — Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 为每位对手各进行以下流程～消灭至多一个目标由该牌手操控的生物或鹏洛客。 II — 每位对手各弃三张牌，然后各磨三张牌。 III — 将所有坟墓场中的所有生物牌在你的操控下放进战场。放逐CARDNAME，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. This ability triggers only once each turn.
+2: Add two mana in any combination of colors.

trans-unit.resname: MOM·169 | The Great Work | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target opponent and each creature they control.
II — Create three Treasure tokens.
III — Until end of turn, you may cast instant and sorcery spells from any graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead. Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — CARDNAME向目标对手和每个由其操控的生物各造成3点伤害。 II — 派出三个珍宝衍生物。 III — 直到回合结束，你可以从任意坟墓场中施放瞬间和法术咒语。若以此法施放的咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。放逐CARDNAME，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player or battle, surveil 1, then you may return a land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. (To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

trans-unit.source: Her warning raced through the roots and rivers of Ixalan: prepare for war.

trans-unit.source: {T}: Untap target land.\n{T}: Choose target battle. If an opponent protects it, remove a defense counter from it. Otherwise, put a defense counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.

trans-unit.resname: MOM·201 | Portent Tracker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In the days before the invasion, the symbol of its perpetrator appeared in strange places all across the Multiverse.
trans-unit.target: 于侵攻前几天，进军者的符号就已在多重宇宙各处奇异地方出现。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·202 | Ravenous Sailback | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose one —\n• CARDNAME gains haste until end of turn.\n• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择一项～ •CARDNAME获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。 •消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·202 | Ravenous Sailback | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Converter beasts were sent to ensnare as many of Ixalan's dinosaurs as possible. Many of them were converted themselves—into snacks.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚人大举派遣易化兽去依夏兰捕捉恐龙。它们其中多数确实有了变化～自己变成了零食。

You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，若本回合中有对手施放过蓝色和／或黑色咒语，则检视你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以展示其中一张永久物牌并置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·204 | Seed of Hope | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Wrenn had given everything and asked for nothing. She deserved a monument, but rest in a quiet meadow is all she would've wanted.
trans-unit.target: 芮恩付出了一切，却未求丝毫回报。她虽配得上一座纪念碑，但安息在宁静牧草地中或才是她所希冀的归宿。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·206 | Storm the Seedcore | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In that moment, the fate of countless worlds rested with one dryad and a handful of the bravest Mirrodin had to offer.
trans-unit.target: 那一刻，无数世界的命运就掌握在一个树灵和一群最英勇的秘罗人手中。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·208 | Tandem Takedown | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I take no pleasure in this, but Vadrok might."\n—Vivien Reid, to Lukka

trans-unit.resname: MOM·210 | Timberland Ancient | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Only the trees were old enough to remember what happened when Moag ignored warnings of Phyrexia millennia ago. They were determined not to repeat the mistake.

trans-unit.resname: MOM·211 | Tribute to the World Tree | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Tree was the heart of our world. It made me what I am and pulled me back from the brink of death. I won't allow it to be forgotten."\n—Esika, god of the Tree

trans-unit.source:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one —
• Incubate 2 twice. (To incubate 2, create an Incubator token with two +1/+1 counters on it and "{2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.)
• Transform all Incubator tokens you control.
• Phyrexians you control gain first strike and deathtouch until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，选择一项～ •抚育2两次。（抚育2的流程是，派出一个上面有两个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{2}：转化此神器。」它转化为0/0非瑞人神器生物。） •转化所有由你操控的抚育器衍生物。 •由你操控的非瑞人获得先攻与死触异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. When you do, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value X from a graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以支付{X}。当你如此作时，你可以从任一坟墓场中施放目标法术力值为X的瞬间或法术牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。若该咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

Target opponent loses life equal to its mana value. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓三张牌，然后将两张牌从你手上以任意顺序置于你的牌库顶。 当CARDNAME死去时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。目标对手失去等同于其法术力值的生命。如果它是瞬间或法术牌，则你可以施放它且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you or a permanent you control, that source's controller loses 2 life unless they pay {1}.\n{2}{W}, Sacrifice three other creatures: Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 每当一个由对手操控的来源对你或任一由你操控的永久物造成伤害时，除非该来源的操控者支付{1}，否则其失去2点生命。 {2}{W}，牺牲三个其他生物：放逐CARDNAME，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·292 | The Argent Etchings | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Argent Etchings
trans-unit.target: 银蚀圣典

trans-unit.resname: MOM·292 | The Argent Etchings | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Incubate 2 five times, then transform all Incubator tokens you control.
II — Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain double strike until end of turn.
III — Destroy all other permanents except for artifacts, lands, and Phyrexians. Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 抚育2五次，然后转化所有由你操控的抚育器衍生物。 II — 直到回合结束，由你操控的生物得+1/+1且获得连击异能。 III — 消灭所有其他永久物，但神器、地和非瑞人除外。放逐CARDNAME，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·293 | Heliod, the Radiant Dawn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Heliod, the Radiant Dawn
trans-unit.target: 曙光耀辉赫利欧德

trans-unit.resname: MOM·293 | Heliod, the Radiant Dawn | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target enchantment card that isn't a God from your graveyard to your hand.\n{3}{PU}: Transform CARDNAME. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PU} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标不是神的结界牌从你坟墓场移回你手上。 {3}{U/P}：转化CARDNAME。只能于法术时机起动。（{U/P}可用{U}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·293 | Heliod, the Warped Eclipse | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MOM·293 | Heliod, the Warped Eclipse | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may cast spells as though they had flash.\nSpells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each card your opponents have drawn this turn.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将咒语视同具有闪现异能地来施放。 所有对手本回合中每抓过一张牌，你施放的咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·294 | Jin-Gitaxias | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jin-Gitaxias
trans-unit.target: 金吉塔厦

trans-unit.resname: MOM·294 | Jin-Gitaxias | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Ward {2}\nWhenever you cast a noncreature spell with mana value 3 or greater, draw a card.\n{3}{U}: Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you have seven or more cards in hand.

trans-unit.resname: MOM·294 | The Great Synthesis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Great Synthesis
trans-unit.target: 伟大合成

trans-unit.resname: MOM·294 | The Great Synthesis | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your hand. You have no maximum hand size for as long as you control CARDNAME.
II — Return all non-Phyrexian creatures to their owners' hands.
III — You may cast any number of spells from your hand without paying their mana costs. Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 抓等同于你手牌数量的牌。于你操控CARDNAME的时段内，你的手牌数量没有上限。 II — 将所有不是非瑞人的生物移回其拥有者手上。 III — 你可以从你手上施放任意数量的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。放逐CARDNAME，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Herald of Invasion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rona, Herald of Invasion
trans-unit.target: 进军传令罗娜

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Herald of Invasion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a legendary spell, untap CARDNAME.\n{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.\n{5}{PB}: Transform Rona. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放传奇咒语时，重置CARDNAME。 {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。 {5}{B/P}：转化罗娜。只能于法术时机起动。（{B/P}可用{B}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rona, Tolarian Obliterator
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚抹煞兽罗娜

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhenever a source deals damage to CARDNAME, that source's controller exiles a card from their hand at random. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield under your control. Otherwise, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 每当一个来源对CARDNAME造成伤害时，该来源的操控者随机从其手上放逐一张牌。若它是地牌，则你可以将之在你的操控下放进战场。若否，则你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·296 | Ayara, Widow of the Realm | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MOM·296 | Ayara, Widow of the Realm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: CARDNAME deals X damage to target opponent or battle and you gain X life, where X is the sacrificed permanent's mana value.\n{5}{PR}: Transform Ayara. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PR} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲另一个生物或神器：CARDNAME向目标对手或战役造成X点伤害且你获得X点生命，X为所牺牲永久物的法术力值。 {5}{R/P}：转化阿娅拉。只能于法术时机起动。（{R/P}可用{R}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, return up to one target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，将至多一张目标神器或生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | Sheoldred | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sheoldred
trans-unit.target: 希欧蕊

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | Sheoldred | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a nontoken creature or planeswalker.\n{4}{B}: Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery and only if an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 威慑 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位对手各牺牲一个非衍生物的生物或鹏洛客。 {4}{B}：放逐CARDNAME，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。只能于法术时机起动，且仅限任一对手的坟墓场中有八张或更多牌时。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | The True Scriptures | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The True Scriptures
trans-unit.target: 化真经文

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | The True Scriptures | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — For each opponent, destroy up to one target creature or planeswalker that player controls.
II — Each opponent discards three cards, then mills three cards.
III — Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。） I — 为每位对手各进行以下流程～消灭至多一个目标由该牌手操控的生物或鹏洛客。 II — 每位对手各弃三张牌，然后各磨三张牌。 III — 将所有坟墓场中的所有生物牌在你的操控下放进战场。放逐CARDNAME，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·298 | Etali, Primal Conqueror | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Etali, Primal Conqueror
trans-unit.target: 始霸埃泰力

trans-unit.resname: MOM·298 | Etali, Primal Conqueror | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. You may cast any number of spells from among the nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.\n{9}{PG}: Transform Etali. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位牌手各从其牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张非地牌为止。你可以从以此法放逐的非地牌之中施放任意数量的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。 {9}{G/P}：转化CARDNAME。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.target: 践踏，不灭 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手得到等量的中毒指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·299 | Urabrask | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Urabrask

trans-unit.resname: MOM·299 | Urabrask | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nWhenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target opponent. Add {R}.\n{R}: Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you've cast three or more instant and/or sorcery spells this turn.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，CARDNAME向目标对手造成1点伤害。加{R}。 {R}：放逐CARDNAME，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。只能于法术时机起动，且仅限你施放过三个或更多瞬间和／或法术咒语的回合。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·299 | The Great Work | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Great Work
trans-unit.target: 伟大志业

trans-unit.resname: MOM·299 | The Great Work | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target opponent and each creature they control.
II — Create three Treasure tokens.
III — Until end of turn, you may cast instant and sorcery spells from any graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead. Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).

trans-unit.resname: MUL·8 | Baral, Chief of Compliance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In light of his zealous defense of Kaladesh, the Consulate was willing to overlook any previous transgressions.
trans-unit.target: 鉴于他积极防卫卡拉德许有功，执政院决议对其旧罪一笔勾销。

trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill four cards.\n{T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个神器，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨四张牌。 {T}：选择目标在你坟墓场中的神器牌。本回合中，你可以施放该牌。（你依旧要支付其费用，且仍须遵守施放时机规则。）

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜3。 当CARDNAME死去时，如果本回合中有三个或更多生物死去，则抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·10 | Inga Rune-Eyes | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Her fleet bore countless survivors to safety, slipping swiftly through strange currents no Phyrexian could track.
trans-unit.target: 她的船队快速穿越非瑞克西亚人无法觅踪的奇诡激流，将无数幸存者带到安全地带。

trans-unit.target: 闪现 在你的结束步骤开始时，抓七张牌。 每位对手的手牌上限均减少七张。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·11 | Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: His knowledge of the Multiverse enabled New Phyrexia to strike each plane with surgical precision.
trans-unit.target: 他对于多重宇宙了解之深，令新非瑞克西亚对每个时空发动攻势时，都能如手术般精准地直击弱点。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·12 | Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Her talent for slipping unseen behind enemy lines provided information that would prove crucial to Dominaria's defense."\n—*Heroes of the Second Invasion*

trans-unit.resname: MUL·15 | Seizan, Perverter of Truth | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: MUL·22 | Squee, the Immortal | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: MUL·88 | Urabrask the Hidden | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When the Mirran resistance arrived, the furnace dwellers looked to Urabrask for guidance. His decree stunned the others: "Let them be."
trans-unit.target: 当秘罗志士出现，熔炉居民等着洼巴司下命令。 他的命令震慑了所有人：「随他们来。」

trans-unit.resname: MUL·89 | Valduk, Keeper of the Flame | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Valduk, Keeper of the Flame
trans-unit.target: 源火守卫瓦杜克

trans-unit.resname: MUL·89 | Valduk, Keeper of the Flame | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, for each Aura and Equipment attached to CARDNAME, create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，CARDNAME上每贴附一个灵气或武具，便派出一个3/1红色，具践踏与敏捷异能的元素衍生生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时放逐这些衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·89 | Valduk, Keeper of the Flame | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The hammer strikes. The Flame awakens.
trans-unit.target: 铁锤敲击。源火觉醒。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·90 | Zada, Hedron Grinder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zada, Hedron Grinder
trans-unit.target: 晶石磨工查妲

trans-unit.resname: MUL·90 | Zada, Hedron Grinder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only CARDNAME, copy that spell for each other creature you control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放仅以CARDNAME为目标的瞬间或法术咒语时，该咒语每能以一个由你操控的其他生物为目标，便将该咒语复制一次。每个复制品都要以这些生物之一为目标，且不能重复选择。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·90 | Zada, Hedron Grinder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A hedron holds magic for a thousand years—or less, if need be."
trans-unit.target: 「晶石能驻固魔法千年～也可以少几年，如果需要的话。」

trans-unit.resname: MUL·91 | Fynn, the Fangbearer | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 死触 每当一个由你操控且具死触异能的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手得到两个中毒指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·91 | Fynn, the Fangbearer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Come, Koma, and reclaim what you lost! Or does the great serpent fear a rematch?"
trans-unit.target: 「寇玛，来啊，来夺回你丢失的东西啊！难道伟大盘蛇会害怕与我再战一回？」

trans-unit.resname: MUL·95 | Yedora, Grave Gardener | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Even in death, we never stop growing."

CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped with five slumber counters on it.
As long as Arixmethes has a slumber counter on it, it's a land. (It's not a creature.)
Whenever you cast a spell, you may remove a slumber counter from Arixmethes.

trans-unit.target: 「她天分非凡，能深入敌后不被察觉，屡获关键情报确保多明纳里亚防线不失，可谓居功至伟。」 ～*《二次战役英雄》*

trans-unit.resname: MUL·143 | Ayara, First of Locthwain | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another black creature enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.\n{T}, Sacrifice another black creature: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个黑色生物在你的操控下进战场时，每位对手各失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。 {T}，牺牲另一个黑色生物：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当任一生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，消灭该生物。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·144 | Horobi, Death's Wail | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Wherever it went, death came to Phyrexians and Kamigawans alike."\n—*Records of the Living Historians*
trans-unit.target: 「它所到之处，不论非瑞克西亚人或神河人尽皆暴毙，无一幸免。」 ～现世史家的记载

trans-unit.resname: MUL·145 | Seizan, Perverter of Truth | Card Name

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 2 life and draws two cards.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手失去2点生命且抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·145 | Seizan, Perverter of Truth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In its hatred for the mortal realms, it fought on the side of the invaders, heedless of its own eventual fate."\n—Records of the Living Historians
trans-unit.target: 「出于对实界的怨恨，它选择站在侵攻者一边，丝毫不顾自己的最终下场。」 ～现世史家的记载

Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{B}: CARDNAME gains haste until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: Tymaret's toughness is equal to your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)\n{1}{B}: Exile up to two target cards from graveyards. You gain 1 life for each creature card exiled this way.

trans-unit.resname: MUL·149 | Yargle, Glutton of Urborg | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MUL·149 | Yargle, Glutton of Urborg | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Consuming even a single drop of the oil would spell doom for most living things. But Yargle was not most living things, and he ate enough to clean up most of Urborg.
trans-unit.target: 对凡俗生灵而言，饮下哪怕只是一小滴烁油，便会染疾而亡。但雅骨尔可非泛泛之辈，它将传布乌尔博格各境的油污一饮而尽。

Until end of turn, you may cast that card.\nDash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

trans-unit.source: You may cast CARDNAME from your graveyard or from exile.

trans-unit.resname: MUL·152 | Squee, the Immortal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Squee had never wanted to be a king or a symbol of defiance against Phyrexians. Naturally, he found himself as both.\n—*Heroes of the Second Invasion*
trans-unit.target: 「斯奎从未想过称王，亦未要当反抗非瑞克西亚人的榜样。而如今他自然坐拥两者。」 ～*《二次战役英雄》*

trans-unit.resname: MUL·153 | Urabrask the Hidden | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 当其他魔判官迫不及待准备进军时，洼巴司反而退回了熔炉狱界，拒遵艾蕾侬一切命令。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·155 | Zada, Hedron Grinder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To her delight, she was able to fully realize the explosive magical potential of hedrons.
trans-unit.target: 她终于有机会彻底弄清晶石的爆发潜力，令其狂喜不已。

trans-unit.source: "I always said I had a score to settle with that serpent. I'm a man of my word."

trans-unit.resname: MUL·160 | Yedora, Grave Gardener | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 她向亡者祷颂远古祭词，确保其内在菁华遭机械复用前就会重归大地。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·161 | Aegar, the Freezing Flame | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though Phyrexian machines could adapt to extremes of heat or cold, they never figured out how to adapt to both at once.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚机械能够适应极端酷热或彻骨冰寒，但从不知道如何同时适应两者。

CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped with five slumber counters on it.
As long as Arixmethes has a slumber counter on it, it's a land. (It's not a creature.)

trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒，死触，系命 在你的结束步骤开始时，增殖。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Leading from behind had never been her style.

trans-unit.target: 行侣～你起始套牌中包含之牌张数量须比套牌数量下限多至少二十张。（如果你选择这张牌作为你的行侣，则你可以在法术时机下支付{3}来将它从游戏外置于你手上。） 飞行 当约力昂进战场时，放逐任意数量由你拥有且操控的其他非地永久物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将这些牌移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·195 | Zirda, the Dawnwaker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Companion — Each permanent card in your starting deck has an activated ability. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} as a sorcery.)\nAbilities you activate that aren't mana abilities cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.\n{1}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 行侣～你起始套牌中各永久物牌均具有起动式异能。（如果你选择这张牌作为你的行侣，则你可以在法术时机下支付{3}来将它从游戏外置于你手上。） 你起动之不属于法术力异能的异能减少{2}来起动。此效应无法将该费用中的法术力减少到少于一点法术力。 {1}，{T}：目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。
